Race.SpecificTitle: Ambulance Serv. Dist. No. 1 -- 9.76 Mills Tax Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ambulance Service District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Ambulance Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a nine and seventy-six hundredths (9.76) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $523,924) on all property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, maintaining and operating equipment and facilities necessary to provide ambulance service and care for the residents of the District?
